message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you first because I think it could be really valuable for you. I'm looking for a price around $20,000 to make it worth my while. What do you think?
Hi Alice, thanks for offering the product to me!  $20,000 is a bit steep for my budget though.  Would you consider $10,000?
I appreciate your offer, Bob, but $10,000 is too low for me. Could you do $17,000? I'm willing to compromise to make this work for both of us.
I understand that $10,000 is a big jump, Alice.  I'm willing to increase my offer, but $17,000 is still more than I had in mind.  How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?
